action.action-desc: Ms. Norton introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To provide for the compensation of Federal contractor employees that may be placed on unpaid leave as a result of the Federal Government shutdown, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Low-Wage Federal Contractor Employee Back Pay Act of 2018.

section.header: Compensation for furloughed Federal contractor employees
section.text: Title VII of Division E of the Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2017 (Public Law 115â€“31) is amended by adding at the end the following new section:

If a Federal contractor that provides retail, food, custodial, or security services to the Federal Government places the employees of such contractor on unpaid leave as a result of any lapse in appropriations which begins in fiscal year 2018, the Government shall provide compensation to such employees at their standard rate of compensation for the period of such lapse.
